comment._content: The former Agnes Huntington, an actress and opera singer. Her husband and daughter Vera are in this one: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2423487202/] She can be seen in a much younger (and highly corseted) portrait here: www.life.com/image/50335442

comment._content: her husband, Paul Drennan Cravath, was a name partner of Cravath, Swain and Moore law firm in NYC: here is his bio: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Cravath
